name: Dire Wildebeest
description: A large, powerful beast with an impressive build and natural armor. Its fierce appearance is complemented by its muscular frame and aggressive stance.
memorable: Combines physical strength with abilities to instill fear and facilitate stampedes.
goals: To charge at enemies and dominate the battlefield through intimidation and brute force.
relations: Might be found alongside other beasts or in herds, as it operates independently.
strengths: High physical damage output with abilities to knock opponents prone and summon stampedes.
weaknesses: Low mental capabilities make it vulnerable to effects targeting intelligence, wisdom, or charisma.
attacks: Gore attack inflicting significant piercing damage, followed by bludgeoning damage from its hooves.
most_powerful_ability: Incite Stampede, enabling deadly charges with additional creatures joining the fray.
senses: Passive perception of 13, indicating average awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Lacks notable skill proficiency and has a very low perception.
additional_information: Can inflict fear with Intimidating Glare.
Has Noxious Breath attack that deals poison damage.
Trampling Charge ability allows for tactical advantage.
Condition immune to frightened and poisoned.
Pouring forth long-lasting chaos on the battlefield.
test_queries: fast monster that knocks foes prone
